DOC.brief_summary: This study initiate investigate effect multi micronutrient supplementation 12 month serum haemoglobin level Indonesian young child .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Multiple Micro Nutrients Supplementation
DOC.criteria: Apparently healthy Indonesian infant Age 810 month baseline visit Willing take 2 sachet study product per day Planning reside study area next 1416 month Written inform consent parent ( ) legally acceptable representative ( ICF statement agree child participate study ) Haemoglobin < 8 g/dL screen visit* . Significant congenital abnormality accord investigator 's clinical judgement interfere study conduct assessment Any known condition likely affect nutrient absorption diagnose child 's physician Disorders require special diet ( food intolerance food allergy complaint reflux , constipation cramp special formula require ) . Any current previous illnesses/conditions intervention accord investigator 's clinical judgement could interfere study conduct assessment ( e.g . chronic illness physical mental handicap ) Regular use MMN supplement syrup ( every day > 1 week ) within two week prior entry study . Not intend use micronutrient supplement study Participation study involve similar investigational market product concomitantly within two week prior entry study . Premature birth ( gestational age < 37 week ) Low birth weight ( < 2500 g ) Severely nutrition indicate follow criterion : severely stunt : HAZ < 3 SD ; severely underweight WAZ < 3 SD ; waste : WHZ < 2 SD *Subject haemoglobin level ( finger prick blood sample ) screen visit 810 g/dL give iron syrup supplementation 1 month . Thereafter , haemoglobin level ( whole blood sample ) check baseline visit : If Hb > 10 g/dL , subject eligible randomisation If Hb < 10 g/dL , subject eligible randomisation give iron syrup supplementation 2 month
